ca.ualberta.cs.xpertsapp.model

Class IOManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.xpertsapp.model.IOManager

  • public class IOManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages loading and saving data from disk and the network Limitation: does not delete local stuff when the server deletes it
